definition: ticket/ballot/banknote/CL:張|张[zhang1]/person held for ransom/amateur performance of Chinese opera/classifier for groups, batches, business transactions
(fig.) guarantee of financial support for the rest of one's life

sentences.english: If I go to find a timeless bread ticket, I think no one will choose me.
sentences.chinese: 如果我去找個長期飯票的話，我想也沒人會選我。

sentences.english: She ia a selfish woman who looks upon her husband only as a meal ticket.
sentences.chinese: 她是個自私的女人，她把她丈夫當作是飯票。

sentences.english: Shenzhen Steed dragon Meal ticket Make co Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 深圳市駿龍飯票製作有限公司。
